General.Name: Da-Li Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Da-Li Development Co.,Ltd., together its subsidiaries, operates construction business in Taiwan and the United States. The company operates through development and construction segments. It also engages in sale and rental business of residential buildings and departmental stores. The company was incorporated in 1977 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 96, Jianguo North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
